parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1.34 </value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Increases or decreases the rope length by the given amount. Use relative parameter for changing rope length +/- from current length. </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ropeUnwind]] [rope, speed, length, relative]</value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> rope: [[Object]] - rope object

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> speed: [[Number]] - animation speed in m/s with which to lengthen or shorten the rope. Range: 0.01...20.

</value></part><part><name>p3 </name>=<value> length: [[Number]] - the amount of length change in meters. Range: 0.1...100.

</value></part><part><name>p4 </name>=<value> relative (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] will add or subtract given length from current rope length, [[false]] will resize the rope to the given length

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ropeUnwind]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0, 3, 10]; <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// set rope length to 10m at 3m/s</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[ropeUnwind]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0, 3, -5, true]; <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// decrease rope length by 5m at 3m/s</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Bottom Section</h3>
[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 8, 2014 - 15:28 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tajin|Tajin]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Unwinding speed is not linear but instead automatically accelerates at the beginning and slows down at the end.<br>
The speed also only seems to have no effect when pulling the rope in. (unless the end of the rope is not attached to anything)<br>
High unwinding speeds (over ~250) can cause your cargo to get stuck in midair.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes -->
</comment>
<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on January 4, 2015 - 02:43 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Feint|Feint]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Rope length limits are between 0.5 and 100 meters.
</dd>
</dl>
